Title: The Phantom Menace
No-Spoiler Description: A key political figure is revealed to be more than they seem.
Spoiler Description: Darth Sidious is secretly orchestrating the events as a Sith Lord.

Title: Attack of the Clones
No-Spoiler Description: A war begins under suspicious circumstances.
Spoiler Description: Count Dooku reveals a Sith controls the Republic; the clone army's origins are shady.

Title: Revenge of the Sith
No-Spoiler Description: The Republic falls and loyalties are broken.
Spoiler Description: Palpatine reveals himself as Darth Sidious, executes Order 66, and Anakin turns to the dark side.

Title: A New Hope
No-Spoiler Description: A young hero learns the truth about their father.
Spoiler Description: Obi-Wan tells Luke that Vader betrayed and murdered his father.

Title: The Empire Strikes Back
No-Spoiler Description: A villain reveals a shocking truth.
Spoiler Description: Vader tells Luke: 'I am your father.'

Title: Return of the Jedi
No-Spoiler Description: A final confrontation ends with redemption.
Spoiler Description: Vader turns against the Emperor to save Luke and dies redeemed.

Title: The Clone Wars
No-Spoiler Description: A presumed-dead foe returns.
Spoiler Description: Darth Maul is revealed to be alive.

Title: The Clone Wars
No-Spoiler Description: A Jedi loses faith in the Order.
Spoiler Description: Ahsoka leaves the Jedi Order after being falsely accused.

Title: The Clone Wars
No-Spoiler Description: A dark secret in the clone army begins to surface.
Spoiler Description: Fives discovers the inhibitor chips used for Order 66.

Title: The Clone Wars
No-Spoiler Description: A critical order is issued and a key character must survive.
Spoiler Description: Order 66 is executed; Ahsoka and Rex must survive the betrayal.

Title: The Bad Batch
No-Spoiler Description: The clones face a devastating shift.
Spoiler Description: Kamino is destroyed, and Crosshair declares loyalty to the Empire.

Title: The Bad Batch
No-Spoiler Description: An isolated mission reveals emotional consequences.
Spoiler Description: Crosshair shows signs of doubt and individual struggle.

Title: The Bad Batch
No-Spoiler Description: An attempt to expose the truth has consequences.
Spoiler Description: Senator Chuchi and the Batch try to expose the Empire’s plan for the clones.

Title: Rebels
No-Spoiler Description: A confrontation with an old enemy changes everything.

Title: Rebels
No-Spoiler Description: A discovery reshapes what's possible.

Title: Andor
No-Spoiler Description: A breakout defines the character’s path.

Title: Andor
No-Spoiler Description: The finale reframes the rebellion's beginnings.

Title: The Mandalorian
No-Spoiler Description: An important character appears.

Title: The Mandalorian
No-Spoiler Description: A powerful figure returns unexpectedly.

Title: Obi-Wan Kenobi
No-Spoiler Description: The past and present collide.

Title: Obi-Wan Kenobi
No-Spoiler Description: Two former allies face off with emotional consequences.

Title: The Book of Boba Fett
No-Spoiler Description: The focus of the show shifts.

Title: The Book of Boba Fett
No-Spoiler Description: A familiar face brings new choices.

Title: Ahsoka
No-Spoiler Description: An intense duel leads to an unexpected journey.

Title: Ahsoka
No-Spoiler Description: A character experiences visions beyond space and time.

Title: Resistance
No-Spoiler Description: The larger war creeps closer.

Title: Resistance
No-Spoiler Description: The impact of a major galactic event is felt.

Title: The Force Awakens
No-Spoiler Description: A family betrayal shakes the saga.

Title: The Last Jedi
No-Spoiler Description: A power shift breaks expectations.
Spoiler Description: Snoke is killed; Rey's parents are revealed as nobodies.

Title: The Rise of Skywalker
No-Spoiler Description: A legacy is revealed.
Spoiler Description: Rey is a Palpatine; Palpatine returns.
